metadata.name: UtilityFunctions.ps1 Proxy Dll
metadata.comment: Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script executing a managed DLL with PowerShell.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('utilityfunctions.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsnapin '))))

output.summary: Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script executing a managed DLL with PowerShell.
